patthana16.47:4.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.47:4.2: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pe …
patthana16.47:4.4: anidassanaappaṭighaṃ sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasahetuko ca naanidassanasappaṭigho nasahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.47:4.6: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … avigate cha.
patthana16.47:5.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
